courses.title: Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Master both frontend and backend development to become a full-stack developer using MERN stack.

courses.title: Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: Dive deep into complex algorithms and data structures, preparing for competitive programming and job interviews.

courses.title: Database Management Systems (DBMS)
courses.description: Learn the core concepts of databases, SQL queries, and relational database design.

courses.title: Operating Systems & Networking
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of operating systems and computer networks for real-world applications.

courses.title: Introduction to Programming with Python
courses.description: Start your programming journey with Python, learning basic syntax, loops, and functions.

courses.title: Data Science and Machine Learning
courses.description: Explore data science concepts and get hands-on with machine learning models using Python.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Essentials
courses.description: Learn about securing systems, networks, and applications against cyber threats.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand the basics of AI, including neural networks, natural language processing, and computer vision.
